<style>

    content: "+ IDR 100.000";
    color: green;
    font-family: 'Plus Jakarta Sans', sans-serif;

Shipping & Delivery

Free shipping on orders over $100

  • Allow up to 3 business days for standard orders to be dispatched from our Melbourne warehouse.
  • Monogramming may add an additional 1-3 business days to your processing time.

Standard Delivery (AusPost Parcel Post)

  • Free for orders over $100
  • $7.95 on orders under $100
  • $3 on orders under $15
  • Metro: 2-6 business days from shipping confirmation email
  • Regional: Up to 7 business days from shipping confirmation email

Express Delivery (AusPost Express)

  • $12.95
  • Metro: 1-2 business days from shipping confirmation email
  • Regional: 2-4 business days from shipping confirmation email

More info >

Warranty

Our mission is to stop single-use plastic completely. To do this, we only create beautifully-designed, premium reusable products that you'll love to use and reuse, over and over again.

Enjoy a 12-month warranty period from the date of purchase. If products are damaged upon arrival, products can either be repaired, replaced, or refunded (whole/partial). Proof of purchase is required.

Please be advised that we have a ‘no chew policy’. This means that warranty is void on all products that have been chewed on/destroyed.

More info >

Returns & Exchanges

We offer a 30-day returns and exchanges policy. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, we’ll accept returns and exchanges as long as the item is unused and in original condition. All returns must be shipped back to us at the customer’s expense.

To initiate a return or exchange, please contact our customer service team at support@example.com

settings.heading: Shipping Policy
settings.content:
• Orders are processed on working days (Monday to Saturday) between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM WIB.
  • Orders placed after 5:00 PM WIB will be processed on the next working day.
  • Orders placed on Saturdays after 1:00 PM WIB and on Sundays will be processed on Monday.
  • Maximum order processing time is 2x24 hours.
  • Product deliveries are only made on working days.
  • Delivery times may be extended during the holiday season.
  • Delivery service is provided via regular shipping methods only.
  • Instant delivery service is currently unavailable.

settings.heading: Warranty
settings.content:
• A 1x24-hour warranty applies to product exchanges.
  • Product exchange is warrantied if there is an issue upon receipt.
  • A 30-day warranty applies to functional damage.
  • The warranty covers the repair or replacement of damaged parts.
  • The warranty does not cover damage caused during use.
  • Damage caused by improper use or maintenance is not covered.

settings.heading: Return Policy
settings.content:
Goods Exchange Policy

  • Product exchange is only valid within 1x24 hours after the item has been received.
  • The product must be in its original condition, undamaged, and clean.
  • Product exchange requests must include a reason for the damage along with video evidence of unboxing when the item is received.
  • Send proof of purchase and proof of damage (photo/video) to admin@maestro-nexindo.id.

Exclusions for Goods Exchange:

  • The exchange is not valid if the damage occurs due to usage after the product has been received.
  • The exchange is not valid if the customer makes a mistake in selecting the model or color during the purchase process.

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
    .accordion__content ul {
      list-style-position: inside;
    }
    .accordion__content li {
      text-indent: -1.4em;
      padding-left: 1.2em;
    }
    
    </style>
    <script>
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const accordions = document.querySelectorAll('.product__accordion details');
    
        accordions.forEach(accordion => {
          accordion.addEventListener('toggle', function () {
            if (accordion.open) {
              accordions.forEach(otherAccordion => {
                if (otherAccordion !== accordion && otherAccordion.open) {
                  otherAccordion.removeAttribute('open');
                }
              });
            }
          });
        });
      });
    </script>

<style>
.product .price .badge, .product .price__container {
margin-bottom:0;
}
.tpo_option-set-wrapper{
margin: 0;
padding: 0 !important;
}

padding:0 !important;

border-radius:10% !important;
}
.pplr-drop-item{
border-radius:10% !important;
}
.product-form__buttons{
 width:200px; 
}
.quantity{
border-radius:10%;
}
</style>

<style>
.form__label {
    font-weight: bold;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.product__title h1,
.product__title h2 {
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 1.2;
    color: #333;
    margin: 0;
}

.product__link h2 {
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    font-weight: 300;
}
</style>

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const productList = document.querySelector('.product-grid');
    const products = productList.querySelectorAll('.grid__item');
    
    // Show only the first 4 products, hide the rest
    const visibleProducts = 4;
    products.forEach((product, index) => {
      if (index >= visibleProducts) {
        product.style.display = 'none';  // Hide products beyond the 4th
      }
    });

    // Enable horizontal scrolling for the product list container
    productList.style.overflowX = 'auto';
    productList.style.whiteSpace = 'nowrap';
    productList.style.paddingBottom = '10px';  // Optional, for aesthetic purposes
    productList.style.scrollBehavior = 'smooth';  // Smooth scrolling when user scrolls

    // Optional: Adding a scrollbar style
    productList.style.webkitOverflowScrolling = 'touch'; // For smoother scrolling on mobile
  });
</script>

<style>
  /* Ensure that the product list allows horizontal scrolling */
  .product-grid {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    overflow-x: auto;
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; /* Smooth scrolling on mobile */
  }

  /* Style for each product card inside the list */
  .grid__item {
    flex: 0 0 auto; /* Prevent items from shrinking or growing */
    width: calc(100% / 4); /* Show 4 products per row */
    padding: 0 10px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }
</style>

<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        function formatPriceWithSeparator(price) {
            return price.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ".");
        }

        function updatePrices() {
            document.querySelectorAll(".money, .product-price-wrapper").forEach(function (priceElement) {
                let priceText = priceElement.textContent.trim();

                // Remove "$" and ".00"
                priceText = priceText.replace("$", "").replace(".00", "").trim();

                // Convert to integer for formatting
                let numericPrice = parseInt(priceText, 10);

                if (!isNaN(numericPrice)) {
                    priceElement.textContent = `Rp. ${formatPriceWithSeparator(numericPrice)}`;
                }
            });
        }

        // Observe changes to update dynamically added prices
        const observer = new MutationObserver(function () {
            updatePrices();
        });

        observer.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });

        // Initial update for existing prices
        updatePrices();
    });
</script>
